-- This script was generated by the ERD tool in pgAdmin 4.
-- Please log an issue at https://redmine.postgresql.org/projects/pgadmin4/issues/new if you find any bugs, including reproduction steps.
BEGIN;


CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS public.car
(
    id integer NOT NULL DEFAULT nextval('car_id_seq'::regclass),
    mark character varying(255) COLLATE pg_catalog."default" NOT NULL,
    model character varying(255) COLLATE pg_catalog."default" NOT NULL,
    generation integer DEFAULT 1,
    restyling boolean DEFAULT false,
    colour character varying COLLATE pg_catalog."default",
    CONSTRAINT car_pkey PRIMARY KEY (id)
);

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS public.man
(
    id integer NOT NULL DEFAULT nextval('man_id_seq'::regclass),
    name character varying COLLATE pg_catalog."default" NOT NULL,
    birth_date timestamp with time zone,
    gender character varying COLLATE pg_catalog."default",
    CONSTRAINT man_pkey PRIMARY KEY (id)
);

COMMENT ON TABLE public.man
    IS 'Car owner';

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS public.man_car
(
    id serial,
    car_id integer NOT NULL,
    man_id integer NOT NULL,
    PRIMARY KEY (id)
);

ALTER TABLE IF EXISTS public.man_car
    ADD FOREIGN KEY (car_id)
    REFERENCES public.car (id) MATCH SIMPLE
    ON UPDATE NO ACTION
    ON DELETE NO ACTION
    NOT VALID;


ALTER TABLE IF EXISTS public.man_car
    ADD FOREIGN KEY (man_id)
    REFERENCES public.man (id) MATCH SIMPLE
    ON UPDATE NO ACTION
    ON DELETE NO ACTION
    NOT VALID;

END;
